\N<Luda Soldier>This is the training institution of Luda. If you have no
business here, leave before unnecessary suspicion falls upon

for now, but I wonder what will happen to me and mom if he
ever loses...

\N<Luda Soldier>What am I even doing here... Is it to become a Luda
soldier? Or maybe...

don't want to be seen by the Luda soldiers.

\N<Man>Here is where the children of the town learn. It used to be
a pure place of study, but...
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■Event■>

seen by Rame-chan or anything...

4_セギ16a
\N<Segi>...What are you imitating? Please move aside.

Fubii and his entourage block the way for Segi and Riia.
Fubii, the leader, along with all his followers, wore
unnervingly mischievous smiles that didn't suit their ages.

\N<Fubii>What do you mean 'what'? Obviously, I came all this way to
pick you up.

\N<Segi>I have no reason to be picked up by you. I'll say it
again... move aside.
\N<Fubii>Don't say such cold things. Let's go together.

\N<Segi>Go together where with you guys? I don't know what you're
trying to do with all this... but I refuse.

\N<Riia>Fubii! Wha-what are you imitating?! I don't know what you're
talking about, but you're being persistent!
An exasperated Riia steps in between Segi and Fubii.

\N<Fubii>If you don't know what I'm talking about, then shut up,
Riia.
\N<Fubii>Besides... it's okay. Lady... your mom and I are dating.
\N<Riia>Eh...!?

\N<Fubii>You get it? We're lovers. Maybe 'in love with each other' is
easier for you to understand?

\N<Riia>In love with each other...? What are you talking about? That

\N<Segi>...Of course. The lovers thing is obviously a joke.

\N<Fubii>Eh? That's not it? So, lady, are you saying you're a nympho
who straddles and grinds on a man you're not even dating?
\N<Riia>Nympho...? What do you mean...?

What Fubii was implying passed through Segi's mind. In an
instant, she felt a slight disturbance and gripped Riia's
small hand tighter.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Boy>Ahaha, what Fubii did was true. After all, we saw it with
our own eyes.

\N<Boy>Right, Riia? Your mom likes Fubii. So come on, accept it and
grow up already, will ya?

\N<Segi>Enough already...! Don't tell such nasty lies in front of my
son...!
4_セギ16b
\N<Segi>Eh...!!??
\N<Riia>Mom...!!
\N<Segi>Stop... stop it! Let go of me!

One of the followers quietly approached Segi from behind and
lifted her clothes. Staring at the exposed underwear, the
boy shouted excitedly as if he was having fun.

\N<Boy>Ahaha, just like when we saw it before. You were taking off
your panties in front of Fubii, lady.
\N<Segi>That's not...!
\N<Boy>Don't lie, okay? Right? I saw it!
\N<Segi>Ugh...!!??
\N<Boy>Hey, Fubii. Can I have the lady's panties?

\N<Fubii>Ahaha, what are you going to do with them? Take them home

\N<Boy>Hehe... I did it!

As soon as Fubii gave permission, the boy forcefully pulled

\N<Boy>No way, I'm taking these home with me. Hehe, Fubii said it's

\N<Fubii>That's why it's fine. The lady and I are lovers. This is
what lovers do, it's a token of our affection.

Segi, still holding onto her underwear, closed her eyes and
clenched her teeth. Then, as if she had made up her mind

\N<Segi>Stop... please. Stop saying weird things in a place like

\N<Fubii>Hmm? So it's okay if it's not here?

\N<Segi>I understand... I get it. I don't know what you're planning,

\N<Riia>Mom...

\N<Fubii>Riia heard too, right? What will you do? Will you come with

\N<Segi>Riia... can you go home first? Mommy will be fine, I'll

\N<Riia>Mom...

\N<Fubii>Ahaha, then let's go. I hope the talk is all we need to do,

\N<Segi>What on earth... where are you planning to take me...?

\N<Fubii>Just follow me without talking. Your son isn't here anymore.
You don't need to put on airs.
\N<Segi>...

4_セギ17u

\N<Segi>Don't talk like that...! It doesn't matter who asks, it's

\N<Fubii>I see... So it's the same if they go wild?

\N<Fubii>I was just thinking of asking you to help relieve their

\N<Segi>Wait... don't tell me, you guys... you wouldn't harm Riia...

Their threatening behavior was not just an empty threat.
They were the type who wouldn't hesitate to harm her son.
Segi understood this instinctively.

\N<Segi>Stop it... Don't lay a hand on my son. If you do something
like that, I won't forgive you...

\N<Fubii>Is that so? If that's what you say, then that's fine. So...

\N<Segi>...
\N<Boy>Hurry up... hurry up and strip, lady...!!
\N<Segi>G-guh...!

The followers egged Segi on with eyes full of expectation.
As if she had no escape, Segi clenched her teeth hard.
\N<Segi>This is... wrong, isn't it? Do you guys understand...?

\N<Fubii>Of course. Right, everyone? We can keep this a secret, can't

\N<Boy>Yeah... so hurry up... hurry!
\N<Segi>G-guh...!
\N<Boy>Hurry up... hurry! Hurry!
\N<Segi>...!
4_セギ17b

The followers, who had been noisily clamoring until now,

\N<Fubii>What? Are you going to break your promise? If you do that, I

\N<Boy>Yeah...! If the lady shows us her breasts, then we'll

\N<Segi>What are you... what are you saying...?

The followers once again began to press Segi and make a

Facing them, Segi once again bowed her head and clenched her

\N<Segi>...
\N<Fubii>What's wrong, lady? Come on, hurry up.
\N<Segi>...Really... this is all I'll do.

\N<Segi>And don't talk about this to anyone. If anyone finds out...

\N<Fubii>Alright, alright. You're so persistent. Just hurry up.
Everyone's waiting, right?
\N<Segi>...
4_セギ17c

Segi's ample breasts were exposed in front of the boys. They

\N<Segi>...
